member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadRichTextBox.IsAdvancedSelectionEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a the advanced selection mode is enabled. If so, when the cursor leaves the initial word the selection continues by expanding with a whole word every time until the cursor moves in the opposite direction. When the cursor returns to the initial word the selection continues to expand one character at a time. More about this behavior can be learned in the documentation.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerBase
member.summary: Represents a marker inside a .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerBase.AnnotationID
member.summary: Gets or sets the annotation identifier.
member.value: The annotation identifier.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerBase.SkipPositionBefore
member.summary:
Determines if the will be put before or after the annotation marker.
If the value of this property is true for an , then if you move the caret to the annotation start and start typing,
the newly inserted text will be considered as part of the annotation. Vice versa, if it is set to false, the typed text will be inserted before the annotation. The behavior of is also controlled in the same manner.
member.value: true if the position before the marker will be skipped; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerBase.SkipPositionAfter
member.summary:
A negation of the property. If the position before the marker is skipped, then the one after it must not be skipped.
Exactly one of the positions must be skipped.
member.value: true if the position after the marker will be skipped; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerBase.IsWordSeparator
member.summary: Determines whether the annotation should be treated as word separator.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is copyable.
member.value: true if this instance is copyable; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationRangeStart.SkipPositionsInRange
member.summary:
Determines if the will be put before or after the annotation marker.
If the value of this property is true for an , then if you move the caret to the annotation start and start typing,
the newly inserted text will be considered as part of the annotation. Vice versa, if it is set to false, the typed text will be inserted before the annotation. The behavior of is also controlled in the same manner.
member.value: true if the position before the marker will be skipped; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.BookmarkRangeEnd.SkipPositionBefore
member.summary:
Determines if the will be put before or after the annotation marker.
If the value of this property is true for an , then if you move the caret to the annotation start and start typing,
the newly inserted text will be considered as part of the annotation. Vice versa, if it is set to false, the typed text will be inserted before the annotation. The behavior of is also controlled in the same manner.
member.value: true if the position before the marker will be skipped; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Represents the end marker for a field range in a .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.FieldRangeEndBase.SkipPositionBefore
member.summary:
Determines if the will be put before or after the annotation marker.
If the value of this property is true for an , then if you move the caret to the annotation start and start typing,
the newly inserted text will be considered as part of the annotation. Vice versa, if it is set to false, the typed text will be inserted before the annotation. The behavior of is also controlled in the same manner.
member.value: true if the position before the marker will be skipped; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.Notes.MarkRangeEndBase.SkipPositionBefore
member.summary:
Determines if the will be put before or after the annotation marker.
If the value of this property is true for an , then if you move the caret to the annotation start and start typing,
the newly inserted text will be considered as part of the annotation. Vice versa, if it is set to false, the typed text will be inserted before the annotation. The behavior of is also controlled in the same manner.
member.value: true if the position before the marker will be skipped; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.ReadOnlyRangeEnd
member.summary: Represents the end marker for a read only range in a .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.ReadOnlyRangeEnd.SkipPositionBefore
member.summary:
Determines if the will be put before or after the annotation marker.
If the value of this property is true for an , then if you move the caret to the annotation start and start typing,
the newly inserted text will be considered as part of the annotation. Vice versa, if it is set to false, the typed text will be inserted before the annotation.
member.value: true if the position before the marker will be skipped; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.ReadOnlyRangeEnd.IsCopyable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is copyable.
member.value: true if this instance is copyable; otherwise, false.

member.summary:
Determines if the will be put before or after the annotation marker.
If the value of this property is true for a , then if you move the caret to the field start and start typing,
the newly inserted text will be considered as part of the annotation. Vice versa, if it is set to false, the typed text will be inserted before the annotation. The behavior of is also controlled in the same manner.
member.value: true if the position before the marker will be skipped; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar
member.summary: Specifies the type of calendar used to display a Date SDT.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.Gregorian
member.summary: Specifies that the Gregorian calendar, as defined in ISO 8601, shall be used. This calendar should be localized into the appropriate language.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.GregorianUS
member.summary: Specifies that the Gregorian calendar, as defined in ISO 8601, shall be used. The values for this calendar should be represented in English.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.GregorianMeFrench
member.summary: Specifies that the Gregorian calendar, as defined in ISO 8601, shall be used. The values for this calendar should be presented in Middle East French.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.GregorianArabic
member.summary: Specifies that the Gregorian calendar, as defined in ISO 8601, shall be used. The values for this calendar should be presented in Arabic.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.Hijri
member.summary: Specifies that the Hijri lunar calendar shall be used.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.Hebrew
member.summary: Specifies that the Hebrew lunar calendar shall be used.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.Taiwan
member.summary: Specifies that the Taiwanese calendar, as defined by the Chinese National Standard CNS 7648, shall be used.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.Japan
member.summary: Specifies that the Japanese Emperor Era calendar, as described by Japanese Industrial Standard JIS X 0301, shall be used.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.Thai
member.summary: Specifies that the Thai calendar shall be used.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.Korea
member.summary: Specifies that the Korean Tangun Era calendar, as described by Korean Law Enactment No. 4, shall be used.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.Saka
member.summary: Specifies that the Saka Era calendar shall be used.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.GregorianXlitEnglish
member.summary: Specifies that the Gregorian calendar, as defined in ISO 8601, shall be used. The values for this calendar should be the representation of the English strings in the corresponding Arabic characters

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.GregorianXlitFrench
member.summary: Specifies that the Gregorian calendar, as defined in ISO 8601, shall be used. The values for this calendar should be the representation of the French strings in the corresponding Arabic characters

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.StructuredDocumentTags.SdtCalendar.None
member.summary: Specifies that no calendar should be used.

member.summary: Represents a style definition in the Telerik Documents Model, encapsulating style properties such as font, color, and layout settings that can be applied to document elements.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.Styles.StyleDefinition.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets value corresponding to the unique name of the style, that would be used to identify style in StyleRepository collection in the document

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.Styles.StyleDefinition.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets or sets value corresponding to the name of the style, that would be displayed in Styles dialog, style gallery and other parts of the UI

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.Styles.StyleDefinition.BasedOnName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of base style
member.remarks: StyleDefinition inherits its property values from BasedOn style. Either BasedOn or BasedOnName can be specified. If BasedOnName is specified BasedOn StyleDefinition would be set automatically if this style definition is added to a document StyleRepository that contains StyleDefinition with corresponding Name.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.Styles.StyleDefinition.BasedOn
member.summary: Gets or sets the base StyleDefinition
member.remarks: StyleDefinition inherits its property values from BasedOn style. Either BasedOn or BasedOnName can be specified. If BasedOnName is specified BasedOn StyleDefinition would be set automatically if this style definition is added to a document StyleRepository that contains StyleDefinition with corresponding Name.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.Styles.StyleDefinition.LinkedStyleName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the linked style.
member.remarks: This property can be set to Paragraph or Character style only. Paragraph style can be linked only to Character style and vice versa. StyleDefinition would obtain the corresponding property values from the linked style. Either LinkedStyle or LinkedStyleName can be specified. If BasedOnName is specified BasedOn StyleDefinition would be set automatically if this style definition is added to a document StyleRepository that contains StyleDefinition with corresponding Name.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.Styles.StyleDefinition.LinkedStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets linked StyleDefinition. Only Paragraph and Character types of styles can be linked
member.remarks: This property can be set to Paragraph or Character style only. Paragraph style can be linked only to Character style and vice versa. StyleDefinition would obtain the corresponding property values from the linked style. Either LenkedStyle or LinkedStyleName can be specified. If BasedOnName is specified BasedOn StyleDefinition would be set automatically if this style definition is added to a document StyleRepository that contains StyleDefinition with corresponding Name.

member.remarks: This property will have effect when set to Paragraph style only.

member.summary: Specifies its input color with the specific opacity, but with its color unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a more or less opaque version of its input color. An alpha modulate never increases the alpha beyond 100%. A 200% alpha modulate makes an input color twice as opaque as before. A 50% alpha modulate makes an input color half as opaque as before.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a more or less opaque version of its input color. Increases or decreases the input alpha percentage by the specified percentage offset.A 10% alpha offset increases a 50% opacity to 60%. A -10% alpha offset decreases a 50% opacity to 40%. The transformed alpha values are limited to a range of 0 to 100%. A 10% alpha offset increase to a 100% opaque object still results in 100% opacity.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BlueColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific blue component, but with the red and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BlueModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its blue component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% blue modulate will reduce the blue component by half. A 200% blue modulate will double the blue component.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BlueOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its blue component shifted, but with its red and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ComplementColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies that the color rendered should be the complement of its input color with the complement being defined as such. Two colors are called complementary if, when mixed they produce a shade of gray.
member.example: The complement of red which is RGB (255, 0, 0) is cyan which is RGB (0, 255, 255).

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GammaColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies that the output color rendered by the generating application should be the sRGB gamma shift of the input color.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GrayscaleColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a grayscale of its input color, taking into relative intensities of the red, green, and blue primaries.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GreenColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific green component, but with the blue and red color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GreenModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its green component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% green modulate will reduce the green component by half. A 200% green modulate will double the green component.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GreenOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its green component shifted, but with its blue and red color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HueColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with the specified hue, but with its saturation and luminance unchanged.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HueColorTransform.Hue
member.summary: Gets or sets the actual angle value to be used with the input color's hue component.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 21600000) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HueModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its hue modulated by the given percentage. A 50% hue modulate decreases the angular hue value by half. A 200% hue modulate doubles the angular hue value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HueOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its hue shifted, but with its saturation and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.IColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a color transform that is applied on an input color to produce a new color, without modifying the original one.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.InverseColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the inverse of its input color.
member.example: The inverse of red (1, 0, 0) is cyan (0, 1, 1 ).

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.InverseGammaColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies that the output color rendered by the generating application should be the inverse sRGB gamma shift of the input color.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.IValueColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a color transform that transforms an integer value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.IValueColorTransform.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.LuminanceColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specified luminance, but with its hue and saturation unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.LuminanceModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with its luminance modulated by the given percentage. A 50% luminance modulate will reduce the luminance by half. A 200% luminance modulate will double the luminance.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.LuminanceOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its luminance shifted, but with its saturation and hue unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RedColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific red component, but with the blue and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RedModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its red component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% red modulate will reduce the red component by half. A 200% red modulate will double the red component.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RedOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its red component shifted, but with its blue and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SaturationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with the specified saturation, but with its hue and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SaturationModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its saturation modulated by the given percentage. A 50% hue modulate decreases the angular saturation value by half. A 200% hue modulate doubles the angular saturation value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SaturationOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its saturation shifted, but with its hue and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ShadeColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a darker version of its input color.
member.example: A 10% tint is 10% of the input color combined with 90% black.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TintColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a lighter version of its input color.
member.example: A 10% tint is 10% of the input color combined with 90% white.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a color transform that affects a single value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueColorTransform.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a color transform. A modulation will never increases the original value beyond 100%. A 200% modulate doubles the original value, while a 50% modulate takses only half of it.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueModulationColorTransform.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the modulation value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, ) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies an absolute value that is added to the original value. The shifted values are limited to a range of 0 to 100%.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueOffsetColorTransform.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset value.
member.remarks: Only values in [-100000, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.DrawingColor.ColorTransforms
member.summary: Gets the list of color transforms that are applied to the current color.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HslColor.Hue
member.summary: Gets or sets the angular value describing the wavelength.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 21600000) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HslColor.Luminance
member.summary: Gets or sets the luminance referring to the lightness or darkness of the color. Expressed as a percentage with 0% referring to maximal dark(black) and 100% referring to maximal white.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HslColor.Saturation
member.summary: Gets or sets the saturation referring to the purity of the hue. Expressed as a percentage with 0% referring to grey, 100% referring to the purest form of the hue.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PresetColor
member.summary: Specifies a color which is bound to one of a predefined collection of colors.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PresetColor.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the actual preset color value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbColor
member.summary: Specifies a color using the red, green, blue RGB color model. Each component, red, green, and blue is expressed as a byte value. A perceptual gamma of 2.2 is used.

member.summary: Gets or sets the red value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the red value.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbColor.Blue
member.summary: Gets or sets the red value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbPercentColor
member.summary: Specifies a color using the red, green, blue RGB color model. Each component, red, green, and blue is expressed as a percentage from 0% to 100%. A linear gamma of 1.0 is assumed.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbPercentColor.Red
member.summary: Gets or sets the red value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbPercentColor.Green
member.summary: Gets or sets the gren value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbPercentColor.Blue
member.summary: Gets or sets the blue value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SchemeColor
member.summary: Specifies a color bound to a user's theme. As with all elements which define a color, it is possible to apply a list of color transforms to the base color defined.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SchemeColor.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the desired scheme value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColor
member.summary: Specifies a system color value. This color is based upon the value that this color currently has within the system on which the document is being viewed.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColor.LastColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a fallback color that should be used if the uderlying SystemColor is unknown within the system. It is also the color value that was last computed by the generating application.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColor.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the system color value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaBiLevelEffect
member.summary: Represents an Alpha Bi-Level Effect. Alpha(Opacity) values less than the threshold are changed to 0 (fully transparent) and alpha values greater than or equal to the threshold are changed to 100% (fully opaque).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaBiLevelEffect.Threshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the threshold value for the alpha bi-level effect.
member.remarks: Only positive percent values are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaCeilingEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha ceiling effect. Alpha(opacity) values greater than zero are changed to 100%. In other words, anything partially opaque becomes fully opaque.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaFloorEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha floor effect. Alpha(opacity) values less than 100% are changed to zero. In other words, anything partially transparent becomes fully transparent.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaInsetOutsetEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha outset/inset effect. This is equivalent to an alpha ceiling, followed by alpha blur, followed by either an alpha ceiling(positive radius) or alpha floor(negative radius).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaInsetOutsetEffect.Radius
member.summary: Gets or sets the radius of outset/inset.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaInverseEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha inverse effect. Alpha(opacity) values are inverted by subtracting from 100%.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaInverseEffect.EffectColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color that would be affected by the effect.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaModulateEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha modulate effect. Effect alpha(opacity) values are multiplied by a fixed percentage. The effect container specifies an effect containing alpha values to modulate.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaModulateEffect.Container
member.summary: Gets the effect container.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaModulateFixedEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha modulate fixed effect. Effect alpha(opacity) values are multiplied by a fixed percentage.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaModulateFixedEffect.Amount
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage amount to scale the alpha.
member.remarks: Only positive percent values are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaReplceEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha replace effect. Effect alpha(opacity) values are replaced by a fixed alpha.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaReplceEffect.Alpha
member.summary: Gets or sets the new opacity value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BiLevelEffect
member.summary: Represents a bi-level (black/white) effect. Input colors whose luminance is less than the specified threshold value are changed to black. Input colors whose luminance are greater than or equal the specified value are set to white.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BiLevelEffect.Threshold
member.summary: Gets or sets luminance threshold for the Bi-Level effect. Values greater than or equal to the threshold are set to white.Values lesser than the threshold are set to black.
member.remarks: Only positive percent values are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.
Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.summary: Gets or sets the effects to blend.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color that would be affected by the effect.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TintEffect
member.summary: Specifies a tint effect. Shifts effect color values towards/away from hue by the specified amount.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TintEffect.Amount
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount value.
member.remarks: Only values in [-100000, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TintEffect.Hue
member.summary: Gets or sets the angular value describing the wavelength.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 21600000) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TransformEffect
member.summary: Specifies a transform effect. The transform is applied to each point in the shape's geometry.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TransformEffect.VerticalRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets percentage by which to vertically scale the object.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TransformEffect.HorizontalRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets percentage by which to horizontally scale the object.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TransformEffect.HorizontalSkew
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal skew angle, defined as the agnle between the top-left corner and bottom-left corner of the object's original bounding box. If positive, the bottom edge of the shape will be positioned to the right relative to the top edge.
member.remarks: Only values in (-5400000, 5400000) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TransformEffect.VerticalSkew
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical skew angle, defined as the angle between the top-left corner and top-right corner of the object's original bounding box. If positive, the right edge of the object will be positioned lower relative to the left edge.
member.remarks: Only values in (-5400000, 5400000) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TransformEffect.HorizontalShift
member.summary: Gets or sets the the horizontal shift.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TransformEffect.VerticalShift
member.summary: Gets or sets the the vertical shift.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GradientFill
member.summary: Specifies a gradient fill - smooth transition between a set of given colors.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GradientFill.TileRectangle
member.summary: Gets or sets a rectangular region of the shape to which the gradient is applied. This region is then tiled across the remaining area of the shape to complete the fill. The tile rectangle is defined by percentage offsets from the sides of the shape's bounding box.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GradientFill.Gradient
member.summary: Gets or sets the gradient.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GradientFill.GradientStops
member.summary: Gets the collection of gradient stops.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GradientFill.RotateWithShape
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the fill rotates alongside the shape when it is rotated.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GradientFill.TileFlipMode
member.summary: Get or sets the direction in which to flip the gradient while tiling.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GradientStop
member.summary: Specifies a gradient stop.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GradientStop.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the gradient color

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GradientStop.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates where this gradient stop should appear in the color band.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GroupFill
member.summary: Specifies that the parent element is part of a group and should inherit the fill properties of the group.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.IFill
member.summary: Specifies a general fill type.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.IGradient
member.summary: Specifies a basic gradient.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ILineFill
member.summary: Specifies a fill type that can be applied to lines.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.IRotatableFill
member.summary: Specifies a fill that is not homogeneous and can be rotated.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.IRotatableFill.RotateWithShape
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the fill rotates alongside the shape when it is rotated.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.LinearGradient
member.summary: Specifies a linear gradient.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.LinearGradient.Angle
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle of color change for the gradient.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 21600000) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.LinearGradient.Scaled
member.summary: Gets orset a value that indicates whether the gradient angle scales with the fill region.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PathGradient
member.summary: Specifies a path gradient.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PathGradient.FillPathType
member.summary: Gets or sets the gradient path to follow.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PathGradient.FocusRectangle
member.summary: Gets or sets the "focus" rectangle for the center shade, specified relative to the fill tile rectangle. The center shade fills the entire tile except the margins specified by each attribute.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PatternFill
member.summary: Specifies a pattern fill. A repeated pattern is used to fill the object.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PatternFill.Foreground
member.summary: Get or sets the foreground color.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PatternFill.Background
member.summary: Get or sets the background color.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PatternFill.PatternType
member.summary: Get or sets the pattern type.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PictureFill
member.summary: Specifies a picture fill.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PictureFill.RotateWithShape
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the fill rotates alongside the shape when it is rotated.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PictureFill.SourceRectangle
member.summary: Gets or sets the portion of the picture used for the fill. Values are caluclated as percentage from the picture's measurements.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PictureFill.FillMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the fill mode.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PictureFill.Picture
member.summary: Gets or sets the picture used in the fill.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PictureFill.Dpi
member.summary: Gets or sets the DPI (dots per inch) used to calculate the size of the blip. If not present or zero, the DPI in the blip is used.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RelativeRectangle
member.summary: Specifies the portion of the blip used for the fill. Each edge of the source rectangle is defined by a percentage offset from the corresponding edge of the bounding box.A positive percentage specifies an inset, while a negative percentage specifies an outset.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RelativeRectangle.BottomOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the bottom edge of the rectangle.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RelativeRectangle.TopOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the top edge of the rectangle.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RelativeRectangle.RightOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the right edge of the rectangle.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RelativeRectangle.LeftOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the left edge of the rectangle.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SolidFill
member.summary: Specifies a solid color fill. The shape is filled entirely with the specified color.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SolidFill.Color
member.summary: Get or sets the color of the fill.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.StretchFillMode
member.summary: Specifies that a picture should be stretched to fill the target rectangle.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.StretchFillMode.FillRectangle
member.summary: Gets or sets the fill rectangle.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TileFillMode
member.summary: Specifies that a picture should be tiled to fill the available space. This element defines a "tile" rectangle within the bounding box. The image is encompassed within the tile rectangle, and the tile rectangle is tiled across the bounding box to fill the entire area.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TileFillMode.HorizontalRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal ratio.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TileFillMode.VerticalRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical ratio.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TileFillMode.HorizontalOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal offset.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TileFillMode.VerticalOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical offset.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TileFillMode.TileFlipDirection
member.summary: Get or sets the flip direction of the tile.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TileFillMode.Alignment
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates where to align the first tile with respect to the shape. Alignment happens after the scaling, but before the additional offset.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.CustomDashingScheme
member.summary: Specifies a custom dashing scheme

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.CustomDashingScheme.DashStops
member.summary: Gets the dash stops that described the dashing scheme.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.DashStop
member.summary: Specfies a repeatable part of the dashing scheme.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.DashStop.DashLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the dash relative to the line width.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, ) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.DashStop.SpaceLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the space relative to the line width.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, ) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.summary: Gets or sets the line length in relation to the line width.

member.summary: Gets or sets the line width in relation to the line length.

member.summary: Gets or sets the line end decoration.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.MiterLineJoin.Limit

member.summary: Specifies the text wrapping types.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TextWrappingType.None
member.summary: No wrapping will occur on this text body. Words will spill out without paying attention to the bounding rectangle boundaries.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TextWrappingType.Square
member.summary: Determines if words are wrapped within the bounding rectangle of the parent DrawingML object.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalOverflowType
member.summary: Specifies the text vertical overflow types.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalOverflowType.Overflow
member.summary: Overflow the text and pay no attention to top and bottom barriers.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalOverflowType.Ellipsis
member.summary: Pay attention to top and bottom barriers. Use an ellipsis to denote that there is text which is not visible.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalOverflowType.Clip
member.summary: Pay attention to top and bottom barriers. Provide no indication that there is text which is not visible.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType
member.summary: Specifies the types of vertical text.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.Horizontal
member.summary: Horizontal text.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.Vertical
member.summary: Determines if all of the text is vertical orientation (each line is 90 degrees rotated clockwise, so it goes from top to bottom; each next line is to the left from the previous one).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.Vertical270
member.summary: Determines if all of the text is vertical orientation (each line is 270 degrees rotated clockwise, so it goes from bottom to top; each next line is to the right from the previous one).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.WordArtVertical
member.summary: Determines if all of the text is vertical ("one letter on top of another").

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.EastAsianVertical
member.summary: A special version of vertical text, where some fonts are displayed as if rotated by 90 degrees while some fonts (mostly East Asian) are displayed vertical.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.MongolianVertical
member.summary: A special version of vertical text, where some fonts are displayed as if rotated by 90 degrees while some fonts (mostly East Asian) are displayed vertical. The difference between this and the EastAsianVertical is the text flows top down then LEFT to RIGHT, instead of RIGHT to LEFT.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.WordArtVerticalRightToLeft
member.summary: Specifies that vertical WordArt should be shown from right to left rather than left to right.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.WordsProcessing.TextBodyProperties.RightInset

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.WordsProcessing.TextBodyProperties.SpaceBetweenColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets the space between columns.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 27273042316900] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.AlphaColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies its input color with the specific opacity, but with its color unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.AlphaModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a more or less opaque version of its input color. An alpha modulate never increases the alpha beyond 100%. A 200% alpha modulate makes an input color twice as opaque as before. A 50% alpha modulate makes an input color half as opaque as before.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.AlphaOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a more or less opaque version of its input color. Increases or decreases the input alpha percentage by the specified percentage offset.A 10% alpha offset increases a 50% opacity to 60%. A -10% alpha offset decreases a 50% opacity to 40%. The transformed alpha values are limited to a range of 0 to 100%. A 10% alpha offset increase to a 100% opaque object still results in 100% opacity.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.BlueColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific blue component, but with the red and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.BlueModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its blue component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% blue modulate will reduce the blue component by half. A 200% blue modulate will double the blue component.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.BlueOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its blue component shifted, but with its red and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ComplementColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies that the color rendered should be the complement of its input color with the complement being defined as such. Two colors are called complementary if, when mixed they produce a shade of grey.
member.example: The complement of red which is RGB (255, 0, 0) is cyan which is RGB (0, 255, 255).

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.GammaColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies that the output color rendered by the generating application should be the sRGB gamma shift of the input color.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.GrayscaleColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a grayscale of its input color, taking into relative intensities of the red, green, and blue primaries.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.GreenColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific green component, but with the blue and red color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.GreenOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its green component shifted, but with its blue and red color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.HueColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with the specified hue, but with its saturation and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.HueModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its hue modulated by the given percentage. A 50% hue modulate decreases the angular hue value by half. A 200% hue modulate doubles the angular hue value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.HueOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its hue shifted, but with its saturation and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.InverseColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the inverse of its input color.
member.example: The inverse of red (1, 0, 0) is cyan (0, 1, 1 ).

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.InverseGammaColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies that the output color rendered by the generating application should be the inverse sRGB gamma shift of the input color.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.LuminanceColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specified luminance, but with its hue and saturation unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.LuminanceModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with its luminance modulated by the given percentage. A 50% luminance modulate will reduce the luminance by half. A 200% luminance modulate will double the luminance.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.LuminanceOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its luminance shifted, but with its saturation and hue unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.RedColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific red component, but with the blue and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.RedModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its red component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% red modulate will reduce the red component by half. A 200% red modulate will double the red component.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.RedOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its red component shifted, but with its blue and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.SaturationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with the specified saturation, but with its hue and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.SaturationModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its saturation modulated by the given percentage. A 50% hue modulate decreases the angular saturation value by half. A 200% hue modulate doubles the angular saturation value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.SaturationOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its saturation shifted, but with its hue and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ShadeColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a darker version of its input color.
member.example: A 10% tint is 10% of the input color combined with 90% black.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.TintColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a lighter version of its input color.
member.example: A 10% tint is 10% of the input color combined with 90% white.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ValueColorTransformBaseContext
member.summary: Specifies a color transform that affects a single value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ValueModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a color transform. A modulation will never increases the original value beyond 100%. A 200% modulate doubles the original value, while a 50% modulate takses only half of it.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ValueOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies an absolute value that is added to the original value. The shifted values are limited to a range of 0 to 100%.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ArcSegment.HeightRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the height radius of the supposed circle being used to draw the arc. This will give the ellipse a total height of (2 * HeightRadius).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ArcSegment.WidthRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the width radius of the supposed circle being used to draw the arc. This will give the ellipse a total width of (2 * WidthRadius).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ArcSegment.StartAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the start angle. It will specify what angle along the supposed circle path will be used as the start position for drawing the arc. This start angle will be locked to the last known pen position in the shape path.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ArcSegment.SwingAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the swing angle. It will specify how far angle-wise along the supposed cicle path the arc will be extended. The extension from the start angle will always be in the clockwise direction around the supposed circle.

member.summary: Reads a nullable attribute from an XML attribute and converts it to the specified type using the provided conversion function.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DocumentPosition.PositionChanged
member.summary:
Occurs when the position is moved.
For the caret position, this can be also achieved using the arrows keys or by clicking somewhere in the document.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DocumentPosition.PositionChanging
member.summary:
Occurs before the position is moved.
For the caret position, this can be also achieved using the arrows keys or by clicking somewhere in the document.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DocumentPosition.LocationChanged
member.summary:
Occurs when changing the coordinates of a position.
For the caret position, this can be also achieved by typing, using the arrows keys or by clicking somewhere in the document.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DocumentPosition.LocationChanging
member.summary:
Occurs before changing the coordinates of a position.
For the caret position, this can be also achieved by typing, using the arrows keys or by clicking somewhere in the document.

member.summary: Represents a class that implements the Double Metaphone algorithm for phonetic string matching.

members.member: Prefixes when present which are not pronounced
Maximum length of an encoding, default is 4
Sets the maxCodeLen. @param maxCodeLen The maxCodeLen to set
Determines whether or not a value is of slavo-germanic orgin. A value is of slavo-germanic origin if it contians any of 'W', 'K', 'CZ', or 'WITZ'.
Determines whether or not a character is a vowel or not
Gets the character at index index if available, otherwise it returns Character.MIN_VALUE so that there is some sort of a default
* Determines whether value contains any of the criteria starting * at index start and matching up to length length
Inner class for storing results, since there is the optional alternate encoding.
